result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel P Kallin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • UnemployComp-Fraud to Obtain Benefits, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 108.24(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 1-15-2017 or serve 10 days jail.
DNA to be paid along with fine on payment plan
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel P Kallin

defendant.name: Kallin, Daniel P

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Atty Wolff
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has paid restitution and provides proof to the State.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  The Defendant was sentenced as follows:

Count 1:

FINE: $379.00

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

To be paid at the rate of $25/month commencing January 15, 2017 or serve 10 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment of fine.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 21, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Ronald James Sonderhouse.  Melissa J. Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests adjournment to provide proof of restitution payment.  State does not object.  Court grants short adjournment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 28, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Zachary Hoff for Peter M Wolff.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel requests adjournment for client to pay restitution.  Court addresses the issue of payment of attorney fees.  Court grants.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 28, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on October 17, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Ron Sonderhouse for Peter M Wolff.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court addressed the payment for counsel.  Defense counsel is requesting adjournment as the defendant needs time to pay the restitution. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for October 17, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on August 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court indicates Mr Kallin needs to go to the Business Center to verify payments.  Defendant needs time to pay restitution.  Hearing scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence.

Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment to go over the Discovery that was just provided. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for June 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Cover letter dated 4/25/16 filed by Attorney Wolff filing Demand for Jury and Demand for Discovery.
Defendant to pay: $75/month
Hearing on May 9, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Daniel P Kallin in court.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant to requesting the court to appoint counsel. Hearing scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
